GV05gmandk_u:0: bahiḥprajño vibhuḥ viśvo hy antaḥprajñas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:1: ghanaprajñaḥ tathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:2: dakṣiṇākṣimukhe viśvo manasy antas tu taijasaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:3: ākāśe ca hṛdi prājñas tridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ // MandUpK_1.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:4: viśvaḥ hi sthūlabhuṅ nityaṃ taijasaḥ praviviktabhuk /
GV05gmandk_u:5: ānandabhuk tathā prājñastridhā bhogaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.3 //
GV05gmandk_u:6: sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam /
GV05gmandk_u:7: ānandaś ca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_1.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:8: triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaś ca prakīrtitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:9: vadaitadubhayaṃ yas tu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate // MandUpK_1.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:11: sarvaṃ janayati prāṇaś ceto 'ṃśūn puruṣaḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_1.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:12: vibhūtiṃ prasavaṃ tv anye manyante sṛṣṭicintakāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:14: icchāmātraṃ prabhoḥ sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:15: kālāt prasūtiṃ bhūtānāṃ manyante kālacintakāḥ // MandUpK_1.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:16: bhogārthaṃ sṛṣṭir iti anye krīḍārtham iti cāpare /
GV05gmandk_u:17: devasyaiṣa svabhāvo 'yam āptakāmasya kā spṛhā // MandUpK_1.9 //
GV05gmandk_u:19: advaitaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ devās turyo vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_1.10 //
GV05gmandk_u:21: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhas tu dvau tau turye na sidhyataḥ // MandUpK_1.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:22: nātmānaṃ na parāś caiva na satyaṃ na api cānṛtam /
GV05gmandk_u:23: prājñaḥ kiñcana saṃvetti turyaṃ tat sarvadṛk sadā // MandUpK_1.12 //
GV05gmandk_u:25: bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate // MandUpK_1.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:27: na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitaḥ // MandUpK_1.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:28: anyathā gṛhṇataḥ svapno nidrā tattvam ajānataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:29: viparyāse tayoḥ kṣīṇe turīyaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_1.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:31: ajam anidram asvapnam advaitaṃ budhyate tadā // MandUpK_1.16 //
GV05gmandk_u:32: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:33: māyāmātram idaṃ dvaitam advaitaṃ paramārthataḥ // MandUpK_1.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:35: upadeśād ayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate // MandUpK_1.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:37: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād āptisāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:39: mātrāsaṃpratipattau syād ubhayatvaṃ tathā vidham // MandUpK_1.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:41: mātrāsaṃpratipattau tu layasāmānyam eva ca // MandUpK_1.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:42: triṣu dhāmasu yat tulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:43: sa pūjyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vandyaś caiva mahāmuniḥ // MandUpK_1.22 //
GV05gmandk_u:44: akāro nayate viśvam ukāraś cāpi taijasam /
GV05gmandk_u:45: makāraś ca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ // MandUpK_1.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:46: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo vidyāt pādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:47: oṃkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcid api cintayet // MandUpK_1.24 //
GV05gmandk_u:48: yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam /
GV05gmandk_u:49: praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // MandUpK_1.25 //
GV05gmandk_u:50: praṇavo hy aparaṃ brahma praṇavaś ca paraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:52: sarvasya praṇavo hy ādir madhyam antas tathaiva ca /
GV05gmandk_u:53: evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tad anantaram // MandUpK_1.27 //
GV05gmandk_u:54: praṇavaṃ hīśvaraṃ vidyāt sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam /
GV05gmandk_u:55: sarvavyāpinam oṃkāraṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // MandUpK_1.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:57: oṃkāro vidito yena sa munir netāro janaḥ // MandUpK_1.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:59: antaḥsthānāt tu bhāvānāṃ saṃvṛtatvena hetunā // MandUpK_2.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:60: adīrghatvāc ca kālasya gatvā deśān na paśyati /
GV05gmandk_u:61: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_2.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:63: vaitathyaṃ tena vai prāptaṃ svapna āhuḥ prakāśitam // MandUpK_2.3 //
GV05gmandk_u:64: antasthānāt tu bhedānāṃ tasmāj jāgarite smṛtam /
GV05gmandk_u:65: yathā tatra tathā svapne saṃvṛtatvena bhidyate // MandUpK_2.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:67: bhedānāṃ hi samatvena prasiddhenaiva hetunā // MandUpK_2.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:68: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:69: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_2.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:71: tasmād ādyantavatvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_2.7 //
GV05gmandk_u:73: tānayaṃ prekṣate gatvā yathaiveha suśikṣitaḥ // MandUpK_2.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:74: svapnavṛttāv api tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05gmandk_u:75: bahiś cetogṛhītaṃ sad dṛṣṭaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.9 //
GV05gmandk_u:76: jāgradvṛttāvapi tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05gmandk_u:77: bahiścetogṛhītaṃ sad yuktaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.10 //
GV05gmandk_u:78: ubhayor api vaitathyaṃ bhedānāṃ sthānayor yadi /
GV05gmandk_u:79: ka etān budhyate bhedān ko vai teṣāṃ vikalpakaḥ // MandUpK_2.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:81: sa eva budhyate bhedān iti vedāntaniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.12 //
GV05gmandk_u:83: niyatāṃś ca bahiścitta evaṃ kalpayate prabhuḥ // MandUpK_2.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:84: cittakālā hi ye 'ntas tu dvayakālāś ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:85: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣo nānyahetukaḥ // MandUpK_2.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:86: avyaktā eva ye 'ntas tu sphuṭā eva ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:87: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣas tv indriyāntare // MandUpK_2.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:88: jīvaṃ kalpayate pūrvaṃ vaco bhāvān pṛthagvidhān /
GV05gmandk_u:89: bāhyān ādhyātmikāṃś caiva yathāvidyas tathāsmṛtiḥ // MandUpK_2.16 //
GV05gmandk_u:91: sarpadhārādibhir bhāvais tadvad ātmā vikalpitaḥ // MandUpK_2.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:93: rajjur eveti cādvaitaṃ tadvad ātmaviniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:94: prāṇādibhir anantaiś ca bhāvair etair vikalpitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:95: māyaiṣā tasya devasya yayā saṃmohitaḥ svayam // MandUpK_2.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:96: prāṇa iti prāṇavido bhūtānīti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:97: guṇā iti guṇavidas tattvānīti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:98: pādā iti pādavido viṣayā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:99: lokā iti lokavido devā iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:100: vedā iti vedavido yajñā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:101: bhokteti ca bhoktṛvido bhojyam iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2. 22 //
GV05gmandk_u:102: sūkṣma iti sūkṣmavidaḥ sthūla iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:103: mūrta iti mūrtavido 'mūrta iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:104: kāla iti kālavido diśa iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:105: vādā iti vādavido bhuvanānīti tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.24 //
GV05gmandk_u:106: mana iti manovido buddhir iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:107: cittam iti cittavido dharmādharmau ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.25 //
GV05gmandk_u:108: pañcaviṃśaka ity eke ṣaḍviśa iti cāpare /
GV05gmandk_u:109: ekatriṃśaka ity āhur ananta iti cāpare // MandUpK_2.26 //
GV05gmandk_u:110: lokāṃl lokavidaḥ prāhur āśramā iti tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:112: sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭivido laya iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:113: sthitir iti sthitividaḥ sarve ceha tu sarvadā // MandUpK_2.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:114: yaṃ bhāvaṃ darśayed yasya taṃ bhāvaṃ sa tu paśyati /
GV05gmandk_u:115: taṃ cāvati sa bhūtvāsau tadgrahaḥ samupaiti tam // MandUpK_2.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:117: evaṃ yo veda tattvena kalpayet so 'viśaṅkitaḥ // MandUpK_2.30 //
GV05gmandk_u:119: tathā viśvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu vicakṣaṇaiḥ // MandUpK_2.31 //
GV05gmandk_u:120: na nirodho na cotpattir na baddho na ca sādhakaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:121: na mumukṣur na vai mukta ity eṣā paramārthatā // MandUpK_2.32 //
GV05gmandk_u:122: bhāvair asadbhir evāyam advayena ca kalpitaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:123: bhāvā apy advayenaiva tasmād advayatā śivā // MandUpK_2.33 //
GV05gmandk_u:125: na pṛthaṅ nāpṛthak kiñcid iti tattvavido viduḥ // MandUpK_2.34 //
GV05gmandk_u:127: nirvikalpo hy ayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ prapañcopaśamo 'dvayaḥ // MandUpK_2.35 //
GV05gmandk_u:128: tasmād evaṃ viditvainam advaite yojayet smṛtim /
GV05gmandk_u:131: calācalaniketaś ca yatir yādṛcchiko bhavet // MandUpK_2.37 //
GV05gmandk_u:132: tattvam ādhyātmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bāhyataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:133: tattvībhūtas tadārāmas tattvād apracyuto bhavet // MandUpK_2.38 //
GV05gmandk_u:135: prāgutpatter ajaṃ sarvaṃ tenāsau kṛpaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_3.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:136: ato vakṣyāmy akārpaṇyam ajāti samatāṃ gatam /
GV05gmandk_u:137: yathā na jāyate kiñcij jāyamānaṃ samantataḥ // MandUpK_3.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:139: ghaṭādivac ca saṃghātair jātāv etan nidarśanam // MandUpK_3.3 //
GV05gmandk_u:141: ākāśe saṃpralīyante tadvaj jīvā ihātmani // MandUpK_3.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:143: na sarve saṃprayujyante tadvaj jīvāḥ sukhādibhiḥ // MandUpK_3.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:144: rūpakāryasamākhyāś ca bhidyante tatra tatra vai /
GV05gmandk_u:145: ākāśasya na bhedo 'sti tadvaj jīveṣu nirṇayaḥ // MandUpK_3.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:147: naivātmanaḥ sadā jīvo vikārāvayavau tathā // MandUpK_3.7 //
GV05gmandk_u:148: yathā bhavati bālānāṃ gaganaṃ malinaṃ malaiḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:149: tathā bhavaty abuddhānām ātmāpi malino malaiḥ // MandUpK_3.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:153: ādhikye sarvasāmye vā nopapattir hi vidyate // MandUpK_3.10 //
GV05gmandk_u:154: rasādayo hi ye kośā vyākhyātās taittirīyake /
GV05gmandk_u:155: teṣām ātmā paro jīvaḥ khaṃ yathā saṃprakāśitaḥ // MandUpK_3.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:156: dvayor dvayor madhujñāne paraṃ brahma prakāśitam /
GV05gmandk_u:159: nānātvaṃ nindyate yac ca tad evaṃ hi samañjasam // MandUpK_3.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:161: bhaviṣyadvṛtyā gauṇaṃ tan mukhyatvaṃ hi na yujyate // MandUpK_3.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:163: upāyaḥ so 'vatārāya nāsti bhedaḥ kathañcana // MandUpK_3.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:167: parasparaṃ virudhyante tairayaṃ na virudhyate // MandUpK_3.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:168: advaitaṃ paramārtho hi dvaitaṃ tadbheda ucyate /
GV05gmandk_u:169: teṣām ubhayathā dvaitaṃ tenāyaṃ na viruddhyate // MandUpK_3.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:170: māyayā bhidyate hy etan nānyathājaṃ kathañcana /
GV05gmandk_u:171: tattvato bhidyamāne hi martyatām amṛtaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_3.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:173: ajāto hy amṛto bhāvo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_3.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:174: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:175: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_3.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:177: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_3.22 //
GV05gmandk_u:179: niścitaṃ yuktiyuktaṃ ca yat tad bhavati netarat // MandUpK_3.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:180: neha nāneti cāmnāyād indro māyābhir ity api /
GV05gmandk_u:181: ajāyamāno bahudhā māyayā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_3.24 //
GV05gmandk_u:183: ko nv enaṃ janayed iti kāraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate // MandUpK_3.25 //
GV05gmandk_u:184: sa eṣa neti netīti vyākhyātaṃ nihnute yataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:186: sato hi māyayā janma yujyate na tu tattvataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:187: tattvato jāyate yasya jātaṃ tasya hi jāyate // MandUpK_3.27 //
GV05gmandk_u:188: asato māyayā janma tattvato naiva yujyate /
GV05gmandk_u:189: vandhyāputro na tattvena māyayā vāpi jāyate // MandUpK_3.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:190: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ spandate māyayā manaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:191: tathā jāgraddvayābhāsaṃ spandate māyayā manaḥ // MandUpK_3.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:192: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ manaḥ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:193: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_3.30 //
GV05gmandk_u:194: manodṛśyam idaṃ dvaitaṃ yat kiñcit sacarācaram /
GV05gmandk_u:195: manaso hy amanībhāve dvaitaṃ naivopalabhyate // MandUpK_3.31 //
GV05gmandk_u:197: amanastāṃ tadā yāti grāhyābhāve tadagraham // MandUpK_3.32 //
GV05gmandk_u:199: brahma jñeyam ajaṃ nityam ajenājaṃ vibudhyate // MandUpK_3.33 //
GV05gmandk_u:201: pracāraḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ suṣupte 'nyo na tatsamaḥ // MandUpK_3.34 //
GV05gmandk_u:202: līyate hi suṣupte tan nigṛhītaṃ na līyate /
GV05gmandk_u:203: tad eva nirbhayaṃ brahma jñānalokaṃ samantataḥ // MandUpK_3.35 //
GV05gmandk_u:208: graho na tatra notsargaś cintā yatra na vidyate /
GV05gmandk_u:209: ātmasaṃsthaṃ tadā jñānam ajāti samatāṃ gatam // MandUpK_3.38 //
GV05gmandk_u:211: yogino bibhyati hy asmād abhaye bhayadarśinaḥ // MandUpK_3.39 //
GV05gmandk_u:213: duḥkhakṣayaḥ prabodhaś cāpy akṣayā śāntir eva ca // MandUpK_3.40 //
GV05gmandk_u:215: manaso nigrahas tadvad bhaved aparikhedataḥ // MandUpK_3.41 //
GV05gmandk_u:217: suprasannaṃ laye caiva yathā kāmo layas tathā // MandUpK_3.42 //
GV05gmandk_u:219: ajaṃ sarvamanusmṛtya jātaṃ naiva tu paśyati // MandUpK_3.43 //
GV05gmandk_u:220: laye saṃbodhayec cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ śamayet punaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:221: sakaṣāyaṃ vijānīyāt samaprāptaṃ na cālayet // MandUpK_3.44 //
GV05gmandk_u:222: nāsvādayet sukhaṃ tatra niḥsaṅgaḥ prajñayā bhavet /
GV05gmandk_u:223: niścalaṃ niścarac cittam ekīkuryāt prayatnataḥ // MandUpK_3.45 //
GV05gmandk_u:224: yadā na līyate cittaṃ na ca vikṣipyate punaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:225: aniṅganam anābhāsaṃ niṣpannaṃ brahma tat tadā // MandUpK_3.46 //
GV05gmandk_u:226: svasthaṃ śāntaṃ sanirvāṇam akathyaṃ sukham uttamam /
GV05gmandk_u:227: ajam ajena jñeyena sarvajñaṃ paricakṣate // MandUpK_3.47 //
GV05gmandk_u:228: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05gmandk_u:229: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_3.48 //
GV05gmandk_u:231: jñeyābhinnena saṃbuddhas taṃ vande dvipadāṃ varam // MandUpK_4.1 //
GV05gmandk_u:233: avivādo 'viruddhaś ca deśitas taṃ namāmy aham // MandUpK_4.2 //
GV05gmandk_u:234: bhūtasya jātim icchanti vādinaḥ kecid eva hi /
GV05gmandk_u:236: bhūtaṃ na jāyate kiñcid abhūtaṃ naiva jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:237: vivadanto 'dvayā hy evam ajātiṃ khyāpayanti te // MandUpK_4.4 //
GV05gmandk_u:239: vivadāmo na taiḥ sārdham avivādaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_4.5 //
GV05gmandk_u:241: ajāto hy amṛto dharmo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_4.6 //
GV05gmandk_u:242: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:243: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.7 //
GV05gmandk_u:245: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_4.8 //
GV05gmandk_u:246: sāṃsiddhikī svābhāvikī sahajā akṛtā ca yā /
GV05gmandk_u:247: prakṛtiḥ seti vijñeyā svabhāvaṃ na jahāti yā // MandUpK_4.9 //
GV05gmandk_u:250: kāraṇaṃ yasya vai kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:251: jāyamānaṃ katham ajaṃ bhinnaṃ nityaṃ kathaṃ ca tat // MandUpK_4.11 //
GV05gmandk_u:252: kāraṇād yady ananyatvam ataḥ kāryam ajaṃ yadi /
GV05gmandk_u:253: jāyamānād dhi vai kāryāt kāraṇaṃ te kathaṃ dhruvam // MandUpK_4.12 //
GV05gmandk_u:254: ajād vai jāyate yasya dṛṣṭāntas tasya nāsti vai /
GV05gmandk_u:255: jātāc ca jāyāmānasya na vyavasthā prasajyate // MandUpK_4.13 //
GV05gmandk_u:256: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ phalasya ca /
GV05gmandk_u:257: hetoḥ phalasya cānādiḥ kathaṃ tair upavarṇyate // MandUpK_4.14 //
GV05gmandk_u:258: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ kalasya ca /
GV05gmandk_u:259: tathā janma bhavet teṣāṃ putrāj janma pitur yathā // MandUpK_4.15 //
GV05gmandk_u:262: phalād utpadyamānaḥ san na te hetuḥ prasidhyati /
GV05gmandk_u:263: aprasiddhaḥ kathaṃ hetuḥ phalam utpādayiṣyati // MandUpK_4.17 //
GV05gmandk_u:264: yadi hetoḥ phalāt siddhiḥ phalasiddhiś ca hetutaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:265: katarat pūrvaniṣpannaṃ yasya siddhir apekṣayā // MandUpK_4.18 //
GV05gmandk_u:267: evaṃ hi sarvathā buddhair ajātiḥ paridīpitā // MandUpK_4.19 //
GV05gmandk_u:268: bījāṅkurākhyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sadā sādhyasamo hi sa /
GV05gmandk_u:269: na hi sādhyasamo hetuḥ siddhau sādhyasya yujyate // MandUpK_4.20 //
GV05gmandk_u:271: jāyamānād dhi vai dharmāt kathaṃ pūrvaṃ na gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.21 //
GV05gmandk_u:272: svato vā parato vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:273: sad asat sadasad vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate // MandUpK_4.22 //
GV05gmandk_u:274: hetur na jāyate 'nādeḥ phalaṃ cāpi svabhāvataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:275: ādir na vidyate yasya tasya hy ādir na vidyate // MandUpK_4.23 //
GV05gmandk_u:280: cittaṃ na saṃspṛśaty arthaṃ nārthābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca /
GV05gmandk_u:281: abhūto hi yataś cārtho nārthābhāsas tataḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_4.26 //
GV05gmandk_u:282: nimittaṃ na sadā cittaṃ saṃspṛśaty adhvasu triṣu /
GV05gmandk_u:283: animitto viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.27 //
GV05gmandk_u:284: tasmān na jāyate cittaṃ cittadṛśyaṃ na jāyate /
GV05gmandk_u:285: tasya paśyanti ye jātiṃ khe vai paśyanti te padam // MandUpK_4.28 //
GV05gmandk_u:286: ajātaṃ jāyate yasmād ajātiḥ prakṛtis tataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:287: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.29 //
GV05gmandk_u:288: anāder antavattvaṃ ca saṃsārasya na setsyati /
GV05gmandk_u:289: anantatā cādimato mokṣasya na bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.30 //
GV05gmandk_u:290: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05gmandk_u:291: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_4.31 //
GV05gmandk_u:293: tasmād ādyantavattvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.32 //
GV05gmandk_u:295: saṃvṛtte 'smin pradeśe vai bhūtānāṃ darśanaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.33 //
GV05gmandk_u:296: na yuktaṃ darśanaṃ gatvā kālasyāniyamād gatau /
GV05gmandk_u:297: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_4.34 //
GV05gmandk_u:298: mitrādyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya saṃbuddhau na prapadyate /
GV05gmandk_u:299: gṛhītaṃ cāpi yat kiñcit pratibuddho na paśyati // MandUpK_4.35 //
GV05gmandk_u:300: svapne cāvastukaḥ kāyaḥ pṛthag anyasya darśanāt /
GV05gmandk_u:301: yathā kāyas tathā sarvaṃ cittadṛśyam avastukam // MandUpK_4.36 //
GV05gmandk_u:303: tad dhetutvāt tu tasyaiva sajjāgaritam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.37 //
GV05gmandk_u:305: na ca bhūtād abhūtasya saṃbhavo 'sti kathañcana // MandUpK_4.38 //
GV05gmandk_u:306: asaj jāgarite dṛṣṭvā svapne paśyati tanmayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:307: asatsvapne 'pi dṛṣṭvā ca pratibuddhau na paśyati // MandUpK_4.39 //
GV05gmandk_u:309: sac ca saddhetukaṃ nāsti saddhetukam asat kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.40 //
GV05gmandk_u:310: viparyāsād yathā jāgrad acintyān bhūtavat spṛśet /
GV05gmandk_u:311: tathā svapne viparyāsād dharmāṃs tatraiva paśyati // MandUpK_4.41 //
GV05gmandk_u:313: jātis tu deśitā buddhair ajātes trasatāṃ sadā // MandUpK_4.42 //
GV05gmandk_u:314: ajātes trasatāṃ teṣām upalambhād viyanti ye /
GV05gmandk_u:315: jātidoṣā na setsyanti doṣo 'py alpo bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.43 //
GV05gmandk_u:317: upalambhāt samācārād asti vastu tathocyate // MandUpK_4.44 //
GV05gmandk_u:319: ajācalam avastutvaṃ vijñānaṃ śāntam advayam // MandUpK_4.45 //
GV05gmandk_u:320: evaṃ na jāyate cittam evaṃ dharmā ajāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:321: evam eva vijānanto na patanti viparyaye // MandUpK_4.46 //
GV05gmandk_u:325: aspandamānaṃ vijñānam anābhāsam ajaṃ tathā // MandUpK_4.48 //
GV05gmandk_u:326: alāte spandamāne vai nābhāsā anyato bhuvaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:327: na tato 'nyatra nispandān nālātaṃ praviśanti te // MandUpK_4.49 //
GV05gmandk_u:331: na tato 'nyatra nispandān na vijñānaṃ viśanti te // MandUpK_4.51 //
GV05gmandk_u:334: dravyaṃ dravyasya hetuḥ syād anyad anyasya caiva hi /
GV05gmandk_u:335: dravyatvam anyabhāvo vā dharmāṇāṃ nopapadyate // MandUpK_4.53 //
GV05gmandk_u:336: evaṃ na cittajā dharmāś cittaṃ vāpi na dharmajam /
GV05gmandk_u:341: kṣīṇe hetuphalāveśe saṃsāraṃ na prapadyate // MandUpK_4.56 //
GV05gmandk_u:342: saṃvṛtyā jāyate sarvaṃ śāśvataṃ nāsti tena vai /
GV05gmandk_u:343: sadbhāvena hy ajaṃ sarvam ucchedas tena nāsti vai // MandUpK_4.57 //
GV05gmandk_u:344: dharmā ya iti jāyante jāyante te na tattvataḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:345: janma māyopamaṃ teṣāṃ sā ca māyā na vidyate // MandUpK_4.58 //
GV05gmandk_u:347: nāsau nityo na cocchedī tadvad dharmeṣu yojanā // MandUpK_4.59 //
GV05gmandk_u:349: yatra varṇā na vartante vivekas tatra nocyate // MandUpK_4.60 //
GV05gmandk_u:350: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā /
GV05gmandk_u:351: tathā jāgrad dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā // MandUpK_4.61 //
GV05gmandk_u:352: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:353: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_4.62 //
GV05gmandk_u:354: svapnadṛk pracaran svapne dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05gmandk_u:355: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.63 //
GV05gmandk_u:356: svapnadṛkcittadṛśyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05gmandk_u:357: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ svapnadṛkcittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.64 //
GV05gmandk_u:358: carañ jāgarite jāgrad dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05gmandk_u:359: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.65 //
GV05gmandk_u:360: jāgrac cittekṣaṇīyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05gmandk_u:361: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ jāgrataś cittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.66 //
GV05gmandk_u:362: ubhe hy anyonyadṛśye te kiṃ tad astīti cocyate /
GV05gmandk_u:363: lakṣaṇāśūnyam ubhayaṃ tan mate naiva gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.67 //
GV05gmandk_u:364: yathā svapnamayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05gmandk_u:365: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.68 //
GV05gmandk_u:366: yathā māyāmayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05gmandk_u:367: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.69 //
GV05gmandk_u:368: yathā nirmitako jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05gmandk_u:369: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.70 //
GV05gmandk_u:370: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05gmandk_u:371: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_4.71 //
GV05gmandk_u:373: cittaṃ nirviṣayaṃ nityam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.72 //
GV05gmandk_u:377: paratantrādiniṣpattyā saṃvṛtyā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_4.74 //
GV05gmandk_u:379: dvayābhāvaṃ sa buddhvaiva nirnimitto na jāyate // MandUpK_4.75 //
GV05gmandk_u:381: tadā na jāyate cittaṃ hetvabhāve phalaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.76 //
GV05gmandk_u:383: ajātasyaiva sarvasya cittadṛśyaṃ hi tadyataḥ // MandUpK_4.77 //
GV05gmandk_u:384: buddhvā nimittatāṃ satyāṃ hetuṃ pṛthag anāpnuvan /
GV05gmandk_u:385: vītaśokaṃ tathākāmam abhayaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_4.78 //
GV05gmandk_u:387: vastvabhāvaṃ sa budhvaiva niḥsaṅgaṃ vinivartate // MandUpK_4.79 //
GV05gmandk_u:389: viṣayaḥ sa hi buddhānāṃ tat sāmyam ajam advayam // MandUpK_4.80 //
GV05gmandk_u:390: ajam anidram asvapnaṃ prabhātaṃ bhavati svayam /
GV05gmandk_u:391: sakṛdvibhāto hy evaiṣa dharma dhātusvabhāvataḥ // MandUpK_4.81 //
GV05gmandk_u:392: sukham āvriyate nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivriyate sadā /
GV05gmandk_u:393: yasya kasya ca dharmasya graheṇa bhagavān asau // MandUpK_4.82 //
GV05gmandk_u:394: asti nāsty asti nāstīti nāsti nāstīti vā punaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:396: koṭhyaś catasra etās tu grahair yāsāṃ sadā vṛtaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:397: bhagavān ābhir aspṛṣṭo yena dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvadṛk // MandUpK_4.84 //
GV05gmandk_u:398: prāpya sarvajñatāṃ kṛtsnāṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padam advayam /
GV05gmandk_u:399: anāpannādimadhyāntaṃ kim ataḥ param īhate // MandUpK_4.85 //
GV05gmandk_u:400: viprāṇāṃ vinayo hy eṣa śamaḥ prākṛta ucyate /
GV05gmandk_u:401: damaḥ prakṛtidāntatvād evaṃ vidvāñ śamaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_4.86 //
GV05gmandk_u:402: savastu sopalambhaṃ ca dvayaṃ laukikam iṣyate /
GV05gmandk_u:403: avastu sopalambhaṃ ca śuddhaṃ laukikam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.87 //
GV05gmandk_u:404: avastv anupalambhaṃ ca lokottaram iti smṛtam /
GV05gmandk_u:405: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ sadā buddhaiḥ prakīrtitam // MandUpK_4.88 //
GV05gmandk_u:406: jñāne ca trividhe jñeye krameṇa vidite svayam /
GV05gmandk_u:407: sarvajñatā hi sarvatra bhavatīha mahādhiyaḥ // MandUpK_4.89 //
GV05gmandk_u:409: teṣām anyatra vijñeyād upalambhas triṣu smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_4.90 //
GV05gmandk_u:411: vidyate na hi nānātvaṃ teṣāṃ kvacana kiñcanaḥ // MandUpK_4.91 //
GV05gmandk_u:413: yasyaivaṃ bhavati kṣāntiḥ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // MandUpK_4.92 //
GV05gmandk_u:415: sarve dharmāḥ samābhinnā ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradam // MandUpK_4.93 //
GV05gmandk_u:416: vaiśāradyaṃ tu vai nāsti bhede vicaratāṃ sadā /
GV05gmandk_u:417: bhedanimnāḥ pṛthagvādās tasmāt te kṛpaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.94 //
GV05gmandk_u:418: aje sāmye tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanti suniścitāḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:419: te hi loke mahājñānās tac ca loko na gāhate // MandUpK_4.95 //
GV05gmandk_u:420: ajeṣv ajam asaṃkrāntaṃ dharmeṣu jñānam iṣyate /
GV05gmandk_u:421: yato na kramate jñānam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.96 //
GV05gmandk_u:425: ādau buddhās tathā muktā budhyanta iti nāyakāḥ // MandUpK_4.98 //
GV05gmandk_u:426: kramate na hi buddhasya jñānaṃ dharmeṣu tāyinaḥ /
GV05gmandk_u:427: sarve dharmās tathā jñānaṃ naitad buddhena bhāṣitam // MandUpK_4.99 //
GV05gmandk_u:429: buddhvā padam anānātvaṃ namaskurmo yathābalam // MandUpK_4.100 //
